page.title: 13SCOUTS
page.content: There is a scout troop in each village in our area. I go to Emley scouts every Tuesday from 7.00 to 9.00 and we do lots of outdoor activities. I have been potholing, canoeing and climbing with them and I have been to most of the normal meetings. We normally go on camp every month. Once every year we have a district camp with scouts from all over this district.Last year we went to Appletreewick and this year we had one in the same place. They were both very good camps and I enjoyed the canoeing because we were all canoeing up the rapids. One of my friends got half way up and then lost control. He snapped a canoe because he hit a rock and the canoe sank.
